alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Horry; Marion; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:41PM EDT until August 07 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bladen County in southeastern North Carolina... Robeson County in southeastern North Carolina... Northwestern Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... Dillon County in northeastern South Carolina... Northwestern Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... Northern Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... Southeastern Marlboro County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 741 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elrod, or 13 miles southwest of Red Springs, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Marion, Dillon, Whiteville, Mullins, Elizabethtown, Red Springs, Pembroke, Fairmont, Tabor City, Maxton, St. Pauls, Chadbourn, Bladenboro, Latta, Rowland, Fair Bluff, Lake View, Sellers, and Boardman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
